New-York Historical Society
Marriage certification of Arthur F. Lewis & Gertrud Findon
Loux, Dubois Henry
AHMC - Lewis & Findon
1 item(s) in 1 folder
1907, 1910 A printed booklet "The form of solemnization of matrimony of the Protestant Episcopal Church in the United States of America" with blanks completed for the marriage of Arthur Lewis and Gertrud Findon at Broadway Tabernacle Church in New York on February 8, 1907. Most of the blanks were completed, and the cover inscribed, by the officiating minister, Dubois H. Loux. On the back cover, is an inscription and two stamps indicating that Gertrud Lewis used this certificate in connection with an oath she took on December 16, 1910.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Marriage certification of Arthur F. Lewis & Gertrud Findon
